0095 1648 1410 1299 0811 2333 2132 0370 1185 1957 2130 (cipher text blocks)

0095^937 mod 2537 = 1520
1648^937 mod 2537 = 0111
1410^937 mod 2537 = 0802
1299^937 mod 2537 = 1004
0811^937 mod 2537 = 2402
2333^937 mod 2537 = 1724
2132^937 mod 2537 = 1519
0370^937 mod 2537 = 1406
1185^937 mod 2537 = 1700
1957^937 mod 2537 = 1507
2130^937 mod 2537 = 24

    A --> 00
    B --> 01
    C --> 02
    ..............
    Z --> 25
